Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu just disable on master please. we'll still need them on v0.6 as the sdk and fabric are still tied together in that branch

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: ~mastersingh24 As mentioned we don't have job to perform node sdk tests on master branch. I will enable node-sdk job in Jenkins ci until sdk node is completely removed from fabric repo.
